Package com.stormpath.sdk.provider

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CreateProviderRequest
    Placeholder for all the information pertaining to a Provider when attempting to create a new Provider-based Directory in Stormpath.
    CreateProviderRequestBuilder<T extends CreateProviderRequestBuilder>
    A Builder to construct CreateProviderRequests.
    FacebookAccountRequestBuilder
    Facebook's specific ProviderAccountRequestBuilder interface.
    FacebookCreateProviderRequestBuilder
    Facebook's specific CreateProviderRequestBuilder interface.
    FacebookProvider
    A Facebook-specific Provider Resource.
    FacebookProviderData
    Facebook-specific ProviderData Resource.
    FacebookRequestFactory
    Facebook-specific ProviderRequestFactory interface.
    GithubAccountRequestBuilder
    Github's specific ProviderAccountRequestBuilder interface.
    GithubCreateProviderRequestBuilder
    Github's specific CreateProviderRequestBuilder interface.
    GithubProvider
    A Github-specific Provider Resource.
    GithubProviderData
    Github-specific ProviderData Resource.
    GithubRequestFactory
    Github-specific ProviderRequestFactory interface.
    GoogleAccountRequestBuilder
    Google-specific ProviderAccountRequestBuilder.
    GoogleCreateProviderRequestBuilder
    Google's specific ProviderAccountRequestBuilder interface.
    GoogleProvider
    Google-specific Provider Resource.
    GoogleProviderData
    Google-specific ProviderData Resource.
    GoogleRequestFactory
    Google-specific ProviderRequestFactory interface.
    LinkedInAccountRequestBuilder
    LinkedIn's specific ProviderAccountRequestBuilder interface.
    LinkedInCreateProviderRequestBuilder
    LinkedIn's specific CreateProviderRequestBuilder interface.
    LinkedInProvider
    A LinkedIn-specific Provider Resource.
    LinkedInProviderData
    LinkedIn-specific ProviderData Resource.
    LinkedInRequestFactory
    LinkedIn-specific ProviderRequestFactory interface.
    Provider
    A provider resource holds specific information needed to work with Provider-based Directories (e.g, Google and Facebook).
    ProviderAccountRequest
    Represents an attempt to get or create a Provider-based Account record in Stormpath.
    ProviderAccountRequestBuilder<T extends ProviderAccountRequestBuilder<T>>
    A Builder to construct ProviderAccountRequests.
    ProviderAccountResult
    Represents the result of the attempt to access the Provider's account.
    ProviderData
    Resource containing Provider-specific data for the Account.
    ProviderRequestFactory<ARB extends ProviderAccountRequestBuilder,PRB extends CreateProviderRequestBuilder>
    Interface describing the builder capabilities that Providers implement in Stormpath.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Providers
    Static utility/helper methods serving Provider-specific ProviderRequestFactorys.
